description: This file defines a DocumentChunking class that implements a strategy for splitting documents into smaller chunks based on document structure such as paragraphs and sections. It includes methods for chunking text, handling overlaps, and generating document segments with metadata.

classes.name: DocumentChunking
classes.description: A strategy class for chunking documents based on structure like paragraphs and sections.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the DocumentChunking with optional chunk size and overlap parameters.

methods.name: chunk
methods.description: Splits a given Document into smaller chunks based on its structure, considering chunk size and overlap.
